TEXT.BODY: 4th qtr Shr loss 17 cts vs loss 22 cts Net loss 14.5 mln vs loss 18.0 mln Revs 27.3 mln vs 23.7 mln Year Shr 58 cts vs 1.01 dlrs Net loss 48.3 mln vs loss 84.2 mln Revs 111.7 mln vs 141.9 mln NOTE: Atlas Consolidated Mining and Development Corp of Manila.
